snippet.title: Me being horrible about a 'game'
snippet.description:
I'm sorry I'm so nice so here's one I don't mind being horrible about. I don't care if it's being 'ironic' or whatever. It's a game that's asking for real money, so it'll be judged as one.

If you like you can vote it 10/10 for the lols or ignore its gameplay failings because 'it wasn't meant to be a good game'. I'm not.

Mr.President is a cheap joke game where you have to save clumsy old Rump across 50 challenging puzzles LOL!

Thanks to David Randall for the music, check it out here: https://soundcloud.com/darandall/holomorphic

Check out my channels:
● 3kliksphilip: https://www.youtube.com/3kliksphilip
● 2kliksphilip: https://www.youtube.com/2kliksphilip
● kliksphilip: https://www.youtube.com/kliksphilip

Other information you might like:
● Website: http://3kliksphilip.com
● Twitter: https://twitter.com/3kliksphilip
● PC Specs: Intel 6800K, 32 GB RAM, Geforce 1080, from DinoPC who paid for my system and have made capturing my videos in 4K a reality!
● Check them out here: http://www.dinopc.com/shop/pc/home.asp
